body:
Congratulations to glitchy1, Mooch24, Princezz_Dubstep, zeus449, and itzdylan115 for being promoted to Mod!

Well earned, and hopefully the remainder of the Jr.Mods will earn the rank soon!

Keep up the great work everyone!
body_tagged:

Keep up the great work everyone!
